content.html: Anecdotally, some of the best work I've seen have often come at time when people and teams had breathing space to do nothing assigned for some time. We seem to forget how Google won the email market with Gmail thanks to their 20% innovation time (which they no longer have).
content.value:
Anecdotally, some of the best work I've seen have often come at time when people and teams had breathing space to do nothing assigned for some time.

We seem to forget how Google won the email market with Gmail thanks to their 20% innovation time (which they no longer have).
